review:
Dr Divya is a wonderful doctor who helped my mother heal her complications post Covid. Her approach in understanding the patients condition, ability to explain the rationale, her knowledge about the diseases and the methodology are extraordinary. Thanks to Dr Divya, my mother is back home and healing very well. I strongly recommend Dr Divya. 

Thank You Dr Divya for saving my mothers life.
*** ** ************** hears the problem really well and then give a suitable solution based on it, so I would highly recommended
Very qualified Doctor. She listens to you and accordingly prescribe medications. She's non judgemental and never ignores your queries. Highly recommended.
